00013

Parameters:
A Banded matrix object of the type BandedMatrix

BlockSize Block size

Definition at line 10 of file BandedMatrixPreallocate.c.

00016 {
00017   BandedMatrix *B = (BandedMatrix*) A;
00018 
00019   B->nbands       = nbands;
00020   B->nrows_local  = nrows_local;
00021   B->BlockSize    = BlockSize;
00022 
00023   B->ncol = (int*) calloc (nrows_local*nbands, sizeof(int));
00024   B->nrow = (int*) calloc (nrows_local, sizeof(int));
00025   B->data = (double*) calloc (nrows_local*nbands*BlockSize*BlockSize, sizeof(double));
